mapper.select: SELECT s.student_id, s.password, s.student_name, s.profile_img, s.gender, s.email, s.student_desc, c.clazz_id, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, c.clazz_desc FROM student s , clazz c WHERE s.clazz_id = c.clazz_id

SELECT s.student_id, s.password, s.student_name, s.profile_img, s.gender, s.email, s.student_desc, c.clazz_id, c.clazz_desc, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time FROM student s,clazz c WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId} AND s.clazz_id = c.clazz_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (student_id, student_name, profile_img, gender, email, student_desc, clazz_id, create_time) VALUES (#{studentId},#{studentName},#{profileImg},#{gender},#{email},#{studentDesc},#{clazz.clazzId},#{createTime})
